Armor[1].name: Leather vest
Armor[1].description:
Simple vest design. Made from hardened leather.
Effective against fire.
Armor[2].name: Loincloth
Armor[2].description:
A torturer's loincloth with straps.
Shows a lot skin and muscle.
Armor[3].name: Priest's robe
Armor[3].description:
A dark robe used by dark priests. It's rather
minimalistic in design. Offers some warmth.
Armor[4].name: Hard leather armor
Armor[4].description:
Upper body armor made with hardened leather.
Great protection against fire.
Armor[5].name: Ghoul outfit
Armor[5].description:
Made from pale skins. Use to hide your scent from
ghouls and strange creatures alike.
Armor[6].name: Guard outfit
Armor[6].description:
Made from guard skins. Use to hide your scent from
guards.
Armor[7].name: Cloth hood
Armor[7].description: A hood made of stitched-together cloth pieces.
Armor[8].name: Leather helmet
Armor[8].description:
A helmet made of leather. It doesn't fit well, it's
too loose.
Armor[9].name: Cloth cape
Armor[9].description: A simple cape to keep you warm.
Armor[10].name: Eclipse talisman
Armor[10].description:
An eastern-style talisman with decorations depicting
an eclipse of the sun.
Armor[11].name: Stone crown
Armor[11].description:
A crude crown sculpted from stone. The style of the crown
suggests a primitive origin.
Armor[12].name: Fur armor
Armor[12].description:
Armor made of leather and wolf pelts. Offers warmth,
but is weak against fire.
Armor[13].name: High priest's robe
Armor[13].description:
A black robe used by the high priests of darkness.
It's rather minimalistic in design.
Armor[14].name: Plate mail
Armor[14].description:
A plate mail armor offers great defense, but is rather
clunky to use.
Armor[15].name: Black dress
Armor[16].name: Wooden buckler
Armor[16].description: A simple make-shift shield. It's better than nothing.
Armor[17].name: Spider shield
Armor[17].description:
An iron shield with the insignia of a black spider. The
shield is light to use, and offers good protection.
Armor[18].name: Eagle crest shield
Armor[18].description:
A shield typically used by the Knights of the Midnight
Sun. The shield has the insignia of an eagle and a sword.
Armor[19].name: Peculiar doll
Armor[19].description:
A doll found in the cells - a doll with long, light
brown hair. The doll gives you eerie vibes.
Armor[20].name: Everwatching talisman
Armor[20].description:
An ever-watching eye is taking care of you. It seems to
relieve your feelings of fear and terror...
Armor[21].name: Arm guards
Armor[21].description: A pair of arm guard to prevent serious injuries.
Armor[22].name: Leg guards
Armor[22].description: A pair of leg guards to prevent serious injuries.
Armor[23].name: Chainmail hood
Armor[23].description:
Chainmail hood gives its users great protection, however
it's a little uncomfortable.
Armor[24].name: Plate helmet
Armor[24].description:
A heavy helmet that not only gives great protection,
but also prevents confusion and getting stunned.
Armor[25].name: Iron cuirass
Armor[25].description:
A plated iron cuirass armour that offers moderate defense.
Without pauldrons, it offers good mobility.
Armor[26].name: Cavewolf paw
Armor[26].description:
A freshly-cut cavewolf paw. It is said to bring good luck,
but surely that's just some nonsense folklore?
Armor[27].name: Sorcerer's stone
Armor[27].description:
A magical ring once worn by the great Bethel. The ring
restores mind during encounters.
Armor[28].name: Ring of the still-blood
Armor[28].description:
A cursed ring that is said to make blood still and thus
prevent bleeding. There's no way to explain this but magic.
Armor[29].name: Ring of wraiths
Armor[29].description:
A ring with a blood diamond embedded on it. The blood diamond
has seen so much death that life force is leaking from it.
Armor[30].name: Thorned ring
Armor[30].description:
A cursed ring with thorns that emit steady flow of poison.
The steady flow makes you immune to larger amounts.
Armor[31].name: Iron mask
Armor[31].description:
An iron headpiece that protects the entire face,
including the eyes.
Armor[32].name: Pinecone pig
Armor[32].description:
The emblem of good luck and fortune. The fact that you can
craft it yourself works as powerful symbolism.
Armor[33].name: Gaunt plate armor
Armor[33].description:
A plated armor that offers great protection. The armor
 bears the heradldry of a bird.
Armor[34].name: Gaunt bascinet
Armor[34].description:
A steel military helmet with a face guard. Offers
protection for throat, neck, and rest of the head.
Armor[36].name: Crow Mauler soul
Armor[36].description:
The condensed wrath of the Crow Mauler. Increases the 
strength of whoever holds it.
Armor[37].name: Iron shakespeare soul
Armor[37].description:
The soul of the Iron Shakespeare enhances the defense
of whoever holds it.
Armor[38].name: Salmonsnake soul
Armor[38].description:
The soul of the Salmonsnake gives its owner a hardened
skin that prevents limb losses and bleeding.
Armor[39].name: White angel soul
Armor[39].description:
The soul of the White Angel gives its owner swift
movements and an extra turn.
Armor[40].name: Black witch soul
Armor[40].description:
The soul of the Black Witch gives its owner occult
powers that poison the opponent.
Armor[41].name: Cavemother soul
Armor[41].description:
The soul of the Cavemother gives its owner increased
aggression.
Armor[42].name: Butterfly soul
Armor[42].description:
The soul of the Butterfly makes it easier to evade incoming
attacks with a feather-light steps.
Armor[43].name: Old guardian soul
Armor[43].description:
The soul of the Old guardian. Just a glimpse of the
determination the guardian had. Prevents you from dying.
Armor[44].name: Red scarf
Armor[44].description:
A tattered piece of the red scarf the Old guardian used.
This scarf proves you defeated Old guardian.
Armor[46].name: Trench coat
Armor[46].description:
A heavy trench coat that is made from hardened leather.
Great protection against fire attacks.
Armor[47].name: Soul devour necklace
Armor[47].description:
A silver necklace with a soul stone embedded on it. The
stone protects against otherwordly powers.
Armor[48].name: Fur outfit
Armor[48].description:
Made from skinned fur. Use to hide your scent from
furry creatures and beasts alike.
Armor[50].name: Monocle
Armor[50].description:
A simple lens worn on one eye. Slightly improves the
accuracy of its wearer.
Armor[51].name: Eyeglasses
Armor[51].description:
You can see the world clearer with these. Greatly improves
the accuracy of its wearer.
Armor[52].name: Eastern perfume
Armor[52].description:
A bottle that contains eastern perfume. The aroma
attracts monsters and beasts of all kinds.
Armor[53].name: Spirit anchor
Armor[53].description:
An ancient relic that is said to bind your soul to your
body in all situations.
Armor[54].name: Penance armor
Armor[54].description:
A special armor created for the Penance Knights of the Vatican.
Once you put the armor on, you cannot remove it.
Armor[55].name: Penance armor
Armor[55].description:
A special armor created for the Penance Knights of the Vatican.
Once you put the armor on, you cannot remove it.
Armor[56].name: Eastern silk robes
Armor[56].description:
Silk robes from the far East. Despite looking rather flimsy,
they provide decent protection against otherwordly powers.
Armor[57].name: Jingasa kabuto
Armor[57].description:
A stylized and specifically-hardened farmer's hat typically used
in the far East. It has been reinforced to be used in battle.
Armor[58].name: Charm of the Yggaegetsu
Armor[58].description:
A charm said to have fallen from the robes of the wandering
warrior Yggaegetsu. Raises critical hit rate of whoever holds it.
